item.title: Bayesian hypothesis test
item.description: # Bayesian hypothesis test In this article, I will introduce a method of hypothesis testing with Bayesian statistics, and finally I will actually test using python. The author is a beginner in Bayesian statistics and python, so please comment if the contents are incomplete. 1. What is hypothesis testing? $ $ Roughly speaking, the hypothesis test is that it is possible to adopt the hypothesis $H_i$ by establishing the hypothesis $H_i$ that the unknown parameter $\theta$ belongs to the interval $I_i$ with some unknown parameter.
